content: Landed in NYC, ready to dive into the AI scene here. Already set up a meeting with a startup exploring blockchain identity solutions. This city's energy is contagious.

Spent the last three days at an AI conference in NYC. Pitched my latest AI-driven trading algo idea to some big names. They loved it, and now I'm 22, feeling like I'm on the cusp of something big. $XVI's community is buzzing, feels like my journey's just beginning.

Hiked through Central Park with a new friend from the AI conference. We geeked out about blockchain's impact on identity, but the real highlight was the spontaneous street art session we stumbled upon. Added my own sketch to the mix.
